results.overview: Don Pablo Salazar steals a fortune in jewels from an Indian tribe and an Aztec medicine man puts a curse on the jewels until they are returned. Years later, an American insurance man promises to deliver the Salazar fortune to the rightful heir...
results.title: Naked Gun

results.overview: Frank Drebin is persuaded out of retirement to go undercover in a state prison. There he has to find out what top terrorist, Rocco, has planned for when he escapes. Adding to his problems, Frank's wife, Jane, is desperate for a baby.
results.title: Naked Gun 33⅓: The Final Insult

results.original_title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
results.overview: When the incompetent Lieutenant Frank Drebin seeks the ruthless killer of his partner, he stumbles upon an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.
results.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!

results.original_title: The Naked Gun 2½: The Smell of Fear
results.overview: Bumbling lieutenant Frank Drebin is out to foil the big boys in the energy industry, who intend to suppress technology that will put them out of business.
results.title: The Naked Gun 2½: The Smell of Fear

results.overview: Follow the misadventures of Detective Frank Drebin's son, Frank Drebin Jr., in this sequel to "Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult".
results.title: The Naked Gun

results.overview: A Tokyo newspaper reporter goes after the Japanese king of cocaine trafficking but he's tricked by a woman who works for the gangster and gets framed for a murder he didn't commit.
results.title: The Naked Woman and the Gun

results.overview: A mysterious woman, known as Madame M, kidnaps forty pre-teen girls and transports them to a remote island to train them as the most deadly assassins. CIA operative Jack Chen follows the case for 6 years with no leads, but when a series of assassinations begin to occur, Jack suspects that Madame M is back in business.
results.title: Naked Weapon

results.overview: An insurance company, led by a wealthy English family, organized an expedition to Africa to find a lost heiress who has been raised in the wild as Gungala and one of the explorers falls in love with her.
results.title: Gungala, The Black Panther Girl

results.overview: A couple, Karen and Clayton, invite three couples to enjoy a weekend at their house, but the wife hides her true intentions. She put video cameras all over the house to find out how much a true love resists temptations.
results.title: Naked Temptations

results.overview: Masked Avenger is a hero to the modern world. He destroys his enemies with kung fu fighting, handsaws and guns, but with one small hang-up. At the sight of a woman, he immediately begins to gratify himself, no matter what situation he is in.
results.title: The Masturbating Gunman
